content: MW-EB Eyebolt Galvanized eyebolt for connecting suitable fixtures to MW wire rope suspension systems ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Wire suspension system- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy to use – fully threaded eyebolts are a simple, versatile interface between MEP or architectural fixtures and wire rope suspension systems Part of the Hilti MW wire rope system – a faster, more versatile solution for installing a wide range of HVAC and electrical fixtures Applications Attaching HVAC fixtures to MW wire rope – including spiral and rectangular ductwork (using compatible MVA duct hangers) Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments only ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Steel Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2331664 - Eye bolt MW-EB 1/4 - Package Size 50 pc - 2331665 - Eye bolt MW-EB 3/8 - Package Size 50 pc
